title: I just finished the last Harry Potter book. Should I start the series right back over again or wait some time? - Quora

response.answer_text: You don’t necessarily need to restart the series again, but I’d recommend checking out the movies if you haven’t already. If you have, try out the companion books JK Rowling wrote: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them Quidditch Through the Ages Tales of Beadle the Bard Harry Potter and the Cursed Child (This one is an epilogue to the main story but I’m not very fond of this one) But I can’t really say anything too forceful. It’s your choice if you want to relive the story once again, but I’m just giving out some tips.

I love those books! Read them all as soon as they came out, and was on my second re-read by the time the last movie spewed out. I re-read the books because that magic was worth revisiting, and to be sure my memory of the richness of the books was not painted over by the mistakes, misinterpretations and missing stories of those movies.
